   <script type="text/javascript">
    // Avoid `console` errors in browsers that lack a console.
 (function() {
     var method;
     var noop = function () {};
     var methods = [
         'assert', 'clear', 'count', 'debug', 'dir', 'dirxml', 'error',
         'exception', 'group', 'groupCollapsed', 'groupEnd', 'info', 'log',
         'markTimeline', 'profile', 'profileEnd', 'table', 'time', 'timeEnd',
         'timeStamp', 'trace', 'warn'
     ];
     var length = methods.length;
     var console = (window.console = window.console || {});
 
     while (length--) {
         method = methods[length];
 
         // Only stub undefined methods.
         if (!console[method]) {
             console[method] = noop;
         }
     }
 }());
   </script>

       <a href="/de_DE/video/hyundai-saison-highlights">
        <div>
         <p class="cta skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           Aktuelle Videos
          </span>
         </p>
         <h1 class="skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           Hyundai Saison-Highlights
          </span>
         </h1>
         <h2 class="skew">

         </div>
        </div>

        </figure>
       </a>
      </article>

         <div class="module--content__text-wrap clearfix">
          <div class="module--content__text-wrap-inner">
           <a class="module--content__link" href="/de_DE/gallery/kaempfe-prellungen-und-brillante-dramen-beim-finale" ontouchstart="">
            <header class="module__header module--content__header">
             <h2 class="module--content__header__heading">
              Kämpfe, Prellungen und brillante Dramen beim...
             </h2>
            </header>
            <section class="module--content__excerpt">
             <p>
              Die besten Fotos eines packenden Abends beim Saisonfinale in Kanada
             </p>
            </section>
            <footer class="module--content__controls clearfix">
             <span class="button button--content-cta">
              Ansehen
             </span>
             <p class="module--content__pub-date">
              <time datetime="2018-03-11">
               Mär 11, 2018
              </time>
             </p>
            </footer>
           </a>
          </div>

   <script type="text/javascript">
    // Avoid `console` errors in browsers that lack a console.
 (function() {
     var method;
     var noop = function () {};
     var methods = [
         'assert', 'clear', 'count', 'debug', 'dir', 'dirxml', 'error',
         'exception', 'group', 'groupCollapsed', 'groupEnd', 'info', 'log',
         'markTimeline', 'profile', 'profileEnd', 'table', 'time', 'timeEnd',
         'timeStamp', 'trace', 'warn'
     ];
     var length = methods.length;
     var console = (window.console = window.console || {});
 
     while (length--) {
         method = methods[length];
 
         // Only stub undefined methods.
         if (!console[method]) {
             console[method] = noop;
         }
     }
 }());
   </script>

     <section class="lead-image lead-image--with-article lead-section--with-widgets" id="hp_feature">
      <article class="active" id="leadArticle">
       <a href="/de_DE/video/hyundai-saison-highlights">
        <div>
         <p class="cta skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           Aktuelle Videos
          </span>
         </p>
         <h1 class="skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           Hyundai Saison-Highlights
          </span>
         </h1>
         <h2 class="skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           In der Saison 2017/18 haben die Ice Cross Downhill Athleten mächtig Gas gegeben
          </span>
         </h2>
         <div class="copyright">
          © Ryan Taylor/Red Bull Content Pool
         </div>
        </div>
        <figure>
         <img alt="Saint Paul" class="responsive responsive-cropbycropratiow" data-cropratio="16x9" data-dimensions="16x9" data-host="http://image1.redbull.com/rbx00487/" data-mountid="443/" data-ratio="landscape" data-src="video/lead_image/ci_us_life_rt_0377__ts__1523001552.jpg"/>
        </figure>
       </a>
      </article>
      <div class="feature-articles">
       <article class="feature">

         <article class="module--standings__standings" id="standings-race">
          <nav class="module--standings__header">
           <p>
            ANZEIGEN:
           </p>
           <a class="no-scroll js-basicTabs is-active" data-target="#standings-race" href="#standings-race-men">
            <span>
             Männer
            </span>
           </a>
           <a class="no-scroll js-basicTabs" data-target="#standings-race" href="#standings-race-women">
            <span>
             Frauen
            </span>
           </a>
          </nav>
          <div class="module--standings__list-wrap is-active" id="standings-race-men">
           <div class="module--standings__list">
            <div>
             <ul class="module--standings__list__chunk list__chunk is-active">
              <li class="module--standings__list__item module--standings__list__item--champion">
               <a href="/de_DE/athlete/luca-dallago">
                <div class="module--standings__list__item__col module--standings__list__item__col--rank">
                 <div>
                  <span class="module--standings__list__item__col--rank__number">
                   1

           <a class="module--content__link" href="/de_DE/gallery/kaempfe-prellungen-und-brillante-dramen-beim-finale" ontouchstart="">
            <header class="module__header module--content__header">
             <h2 class="module--content__header__heading">
              Kämpfe, Prellungen und brillante Dramen beim...
             </h2>
            </header>
            <section class="module--content__excerpt">
             <p>
              Die besten Fotos eines packenden Abends beim Saisonfinale in Kanada
             </p>
            </section>
            <footer class="module--content__controls clearfix">
             <span class="button button--content-cta">
              Ansehen
             </span>
             <p class="module--content__pub-date">
              <time datetime="2018-03-11">
               Mär 11, 2018
              </time>
             </p>
            </footer>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </article>

    // Avoid `console` errors in browsers that lack a console.
 (function() {
     var method;
     var noop = function () {};
     var methods = [
         'assert', 'clear', 'count', 'debug', 'dir', 'dirxml', 'error',
         'exception', 'group', 'groupCollapsed', 'groupEnd', 'info', 'log',
         'markTimeline', 'profile', 'profileEnd', 'table', 'time', 'timeEnd',

               <br/>
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>

       <a href="/de_DE/video/hyundai-saison-highlights">
        <div>
         <p class="cta skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           Aktuelle Videos
          </span>
         </p>
         <h1 class="skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           Hyundai Saison-Highlights
          </span>
         </h1>
         <h2 class="skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           In der Saison 2017/18 haben die Ice Cross Downhill Athleten mächtig Gas gegeben
          </span>
         </h2>
         <div class="copyright">
          © Ryan Taylor/Red Bull Content Pool
         </div>
        </div>

        </figure>
       </a>
      </article>

              <li class="module--standings__list__item ">

                 </span>
                 <span class="module--standings__list__item__col--athlete__country">
                  JPN
                 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="module--standings__list__item__col module--standings__list__item__col--points">
                 <span class="module--standings__list__item__col--points__number">
                  260.00
                 </span>
                 <span class="module--standings__list__item__col--points__label">
                  Punkte
                 </span>
                </div>
               </a>
              </li>
             </ul>
            </div>
           </div>

          </i>

         <figure class="spinner overlay--image overlay--image--bc" id="overlay5751642262001">
          <img alt="Scott Croxall" class="responsive responsive-cropbycropratiow" data-cropratio="16x9" data-dimensions="16x9" data-host="http://image.redbull.com/rbx00487/" data-mountid="443/" data-ratio="landscape" data-src="video/lead_image/ci_ca_3204_jm_51068__ts__1521120872.jpg"/>
         </figure>
        </div>
        <div class="module--content__text-wrap-wrap">
         <div class="module--content__text-wrap clearfix " id="caption5751642262001">
          <div class="module--content__text-wrap-inner">
           <a class="module--content__link" href="/de_DE/video/die-besten-5-momente-aus-edmonton">
            <header class="module__header module--content__header ">
             <h2 class="module--content__header__heading">
              Die besten 5 Momente aus Edmonton
             </h2>
            </header>
            <section class="module--content__excerpt">
             <p>
              Fünf Gründe, warum Kanada allen lange in Erinnerung bleiben wird
             </p>
            </section>
            <footer class="module--content__controls clearfix">
             <span class="button button--content-cta">
              Ansehen
             </span>
             <p class="module--content__pub-date">
              <time datetime="2018-03-14">
               Mär 14, 2018
              </time>
             </p>
            </footer>
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </article>

         /* Track click on any element as Event - used for Google Analytics event tracking  */
         jQuery('body').on( 'click', '[data-trackEvent]', function(ev) {
 
             var btn = $(this),
                 category = btn.attr('data-trackEventCat'),
                 tag = btn.prop('tagName'),

                         'event': 'GAEvent',
                         'eventCategory': category,
                         'eventAction': action,

                     });

         });
     });

     var method;
     var noop = function () {};
     var methods = [
         'assert', 'clear', 'count', 'debug', 'dir', 'dirxml', 'error',
         'exception', 'group', 'groupCollapsed', 'groupEnd', 'info', 'log',

      <article class="active" id="leadArticle">
       <a href="/de_DE/video/hyundai-saison-highlights">
        <div>
         <p class="cta skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           Aktuelle Videos
          </span>
         </p>
         <h1 class="skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           Hyundai Saison-Highlights
          </span>
         </h1>
         <h2 class="skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           In der Saison 2017/18 haben die Ice Cross Downhill Athleten mächtig Gas gegeben
          </span>
         </h2>
         <div class="copyright">
          © Ryan Taylor/Red Bull Content Pool
         </div>
        </div>
        <figure>
         <img alt="Saint Paul" class="responsive responsive-cropbycropratiow" data-cropratio="16x9" data-dimensions="16x9" data-host="http://image1.redbull.com/rbx00487/" data-mountid="443/" data-ratio="landscape" data-src="video/lead_image/ci_us_life_rt_0377__ts__1523001552.jpg"/>
        </figure>
       </a>
      </article>
      <div class="feature-articles">
       <article class="feature">

           </span>
          </h2>

         </figure>
        </a>
       </article>
       <article class="feature">
        <a href="de_DE/event/edmonton">
         <div class="feature-text skew">
          <h2 class="feature-text-inner skew-inner">
           Schau dir die Wiederholung von Edmonton an
           <span>
            Erlebe die Action hier noch einmal
           </span>
          </h2>
         </div>
         <figure class="feature-image spinner">
          <img alt="" class="responsive responsive-cropbycropratiow" data-cropratio="160x85" data-dimensions="160x85" data-host="http://image.redbull.com/rbx00487/" data-mountid="443/" data-ratio="landscape" data-src="ci_ca_0401_al_4659_2.jpg"/>
         </figure>
        </a>
       </article>

             var btn = $(this),

 (function() {
     var method;
     var noop = function () {};
     var methods = [
         'assert', 'clear', 'count', 'debug', 'dir', 'dirxml', 'error',
         'exception', 'group', 'groupCollapsed', 'groupEnd', 'info', 'log',
         'markTimeline', 'profile', 'profileEnd', 'table', 'time', 'timeEnd',

     var console = (window.console = window.console || {});
 
     while (length--) {

     }
 }());

      <article class="active" id="leadArticle">
       <a href="/de_DE/video/hyundai-saison-highlights">
        <div>
         <p class="cta skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           Aktuelle Videos
          </span>
         </p>
         <h1 class="skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           Hyundai Saison-Highlights
          </span>
         </h1>
         <h2 class="skew">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           In der Saison 2017/18 haben die Ice Cross Downhill Athleten mächtig Gas gegeben
          </span>
         </h2>
         <div class="copyright">
          © Ryan Taylor/Red Bull Content Pool
         </div>
        </div>
        <figure>
         <img alt="Saint Paul" class="responsive responsive-cropbycropratiow" data-cropratio="16x9" data-dimensions="16x9" data-host="http://image1.redbull.com/rbx00487/" data-mountid="443/" data-ratio="landscape" data-src="video/lead_image/ci_us_life_rt_0377__ts__1523001552.jpg"/>
        </figure>
       </a>
      </article>
      <div class="feature-articles">
       <article class="feature">
        <a href="de_DE/article/croxall-und-trunzo-holen-sich-wm-titel-kanada">

           </span>
          </h2>

         </figure>
        </a>
       </article>

        </li>

         <a class="skew js-contentFilter" data-domelementclasstocount="module--content" data-domelementclasstopopulate="js-contentGrid" data-filterselectedloadmore="/de_DE/loadmore?id=home-filter-videos-lm" data-filterurl="/de_DE/loadmore?id=home-filter-videos" data-trackevent="Browse" data-trackeventcat="Content" data-trackeventlabel="Videos" href="javascript:void()">
          <span class="skew-inner">
           Videos
          </span>
         </a>
        </li>

          <span class="skew-inner">
           Fotos
          </span>
         </a>
        </li>

          <span class="skew-inner">
           Artikel
          </span>

            <header class="module__header module--content__header ">
             <h2 class="module--content__header__heading">
              Rückblick auf den Titelkampf 2017/18 bei den Männern
             </h2>
            </header>
            <section class="module--content__excerpt">
             <p>
              Es war einmal mehr ein dramatische und ereignisreiche Ice Cross Downhill...
             </p>
            </section>
           </a>
          </div>

        <section class="module--event-highlights__content js-highlightsSlider">
         <div class="module--event-highlights__content__item " data-index="0" id="saint-paul-2">
          <div class="js-highlightsVideos rsDefault" data-trackevent="Browse" data-trackeventcat="Gallery" data-trackeventlabel="Video Play">
           <div class="rsContent" id="video-1">
            <figure class="module--event-highlights__content__item spinner">
             <img alt="" class="rsImg responsive responsive-cropbycropratiow" data-cropratio="16x9" data-dimensions="16x9" data-host="http://image1.redbull.com/rbx00487/" data-mountid="443/" data-ratio="landscape" data-rsvideo="5715968372001" data-src="ci_us_0401_jm_0399_1.jpg"/>
            </figure>
            <p class="module--event-highlights__content__item__description">
             Die besten Momente aus Saint Paul
            </p>

    $(document).ready(function(){
         /* ========================================================================================================= */
         /* Track click on any element as Event - used for Google Analytics event tracking  */
         jQuery('body').on( 'click', '[data-trackEvent]', function(ev) {
 
             var btn = $(this),
                 category = btn.attr('data-trackEventCat'),
                 tag = btn.prop('tagName'),
                 label = btn.attr('data-trackEventLabel'),
                 action = btn.attr('data-trackEvent');
 
                 if ( typeof dataLayer_GTM_PHMG6M !== 'undefined' ) {
                     dataLayer_GTM_PHMG6M.push({
                         'event': 'GAEvent',
                         'eventCategory': category,
                         'eventAction': action,
                         'eventLabel': label
                     });
                 }
                 //dataLayer_GTM_PHMG6M
         });
     });
